signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: create or open file
    authors:
      - michael.hunhoff@mandiant.com
      - joakim@intezer.com
    lib: true
    scope: basic block
    mbc:
      - File System::Create File [C0016]
    examples:
      - B5F85C26D7AA5A1FB4AF5821B6B5AB9B:0x401D7E
  features:
    - or:
      - api: CreateFile
      - api: CreateFileEx
      - api: IoCreateFile
      - api: IoCreateFileEx
      - api: ZwOpenFile
      - api: ZwCreateFile
      - api: NtOpenFile
      - api: NtCreateFile
      - api: fopen
      - api: fopen64
      - api: fdopen
      - api: freopen
      - api: open
      - api: openat
signature_matches.name: create or open file

signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: change file permission on Linux
    namespace: host-interaction/file-system
    authors:
      - joakim@intezer.com
    scope: basic block
    mbc:
      - File System::Set File Attributes [C0050]
    examples:
      - 7351f8a40c5450557b24622417fc478d:0x407C68
  features:
    - and:
      - os: linux
      - or:
        - api: chown
        - api: fchown
        - api: lchown
        - api: fchownat
signature_matches.name: change file permission on Linux

signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: create process on Linux
    namespace: host-interaction/process/create
    authors:
      - joakim@intezer.com
    scope: basic block
    mbc:
      - Process::Create Process [C0017]
    examples:
      - 7351f8a40c5450557b24622417fc478d:0x40236D
  features:
    - and:
      - os: linux
      - or:
        - api: execve
        - api: execl
        - api: execlp
        - api: execle
        - api: execv
        - api: execvp
        - api: execvpe
        - api: posix_spawn
        - api: posix_spawnp
        - api: popen
signature_matches.name: create process on Linux

signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: contain loop
    authors:
      - moritz.raabe@mandiant.com
    lib: true
    scope: function
    examples:
      - 08AC667C65D36D6542917655571E61C8:0x406EAA
  features:
    - or:
      - characteristic: loop
      - characteristic: tight loop
      - characteristic: recursive call
signature_matches.name: contain loop

signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: write file on Linux
    namespace: host-interaction/file-system/write
    authors:
      - joakim@intezer.com
    scope: function
    mbc:
      - File System::Writes File [C0052]
    examples:
      - 7351f8a40c5450557b24622417fc478d:0x401E14
  features:
    - and:
      - os: linux
      - or:
        - api: fputc
        - api: fputs
        - api: putc
        - api: write
        - api: fputwc
        - api: putwc
        - api: fputws
        - api: write
        - api: fwrite
        - api: putwchar
      - optional:
        - match: create or open file
signature_matches.name: write file on Linux

signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: enumerate files on Linux
    namespace: host-interaction/file-system/files/list
    authors:
      - william.ballenthin@mandiant.com
    scope: function
    att&ck:
      - Discovery::File and Directory Discovery [T1083]
    examples:
      - 7351f8a40c5450557b24622417fc478d:0x405438
  features:
    - and:
      - os: linux
      - or:
        - and:
          - match: create or open file
          - or:
            - api: getdents
            - api: getdents64
        - and:
          - api: opendir
          - api: readdir
signature_matches.name: enumerate files on Linux

signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: read file on Linux
    namespace: host-interaction/file-system/read
    authors:
      - joakim@intezer.com
    scope: function
    mbc:
      - File System::Read File [C0051]
    examples:
      - 7351f8a40c5450557b24622417fc478d:0x4059AD
  features:
    - and:
      - os: linux
      - optional:
        - match: create or open file
      - or:
        - api: fgetc
        - api: fgets
        - api: getc
        - api: getchar
        - api: read
        - api: getline
        - api: getdelim
        - api: fgetwc
        - api: getwc
        - api: fscanf
        - api: vfscanf
        - api: fread
signature_matches.name: read file on Linux

signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: get local IPv4 addresses
    namespace: host-interaction/network/address
    authors:
      - moritz.raabe@mandiant.com
      - joakim@intezer.com
    scope: function
    att&ck:
      - Discovery::System Network Configuration Discovery [T1016]
    examples:
      - Practical Malware Analysis Lab 05-01.dll_:0x100037e6
      - 4C0553285D724DCAF5909924B4E3E90A:0x402010
  features:
    - or:
      - api: getsockname
      - and:
        - api: GetAdaptersInfo
        - offset: 0x1B0 = IP_ADAPTER_INFO.IpAddressList.IpAddress
        # loop feature?
      - and:
        - api: GetAdaptersAddresses
        - optional:
          - or:
            - number: 0 = AF_UNSPEC
            - number: 2 = AF_INET
            - number: 23 = AF_INET6
signature_matches.name: get local IPv4 addresses

signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: write and execute a file
    namespace: c2/file-transfer
    maec/malware-category: launcher
    authors:
      - moritz.raabe@mandiant.com
    scope: function
    mbc:
      - Execution::Install Additional Program [B0023]
    examples:
      - 9324D1A8AE37A36AE560C37448C9705A:0x403A40
      - Practical Malware Analysis Lab 01-04.exe_:0x4011FC
  features:
    - and:
      - match: host-interaction/file-system/write
      - match: host-interaction/process/create
signature_matches.name: write and execute a file

signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:

    mbc:

  features:
    - and:
      - os: linux
      - or:
        - and:
          - match: create or open file
          - or:
            - api: getdents
            - api: getdents64
        - and:
          - api: opendir
          - api: readdir
signature_matches.name: enumerate files on Linux

signature_matches.rule_src:
rule:
  meta:
    name: write and execute a file
    namespace: communication/c2/file-transfer
    maec/malware-category: launcher
    authors:
      - moritz.raabe@mandiant.com
    scope: function
    mbc:
      - Execution::Install Additional Program [B0023]
    examples:
      - 9324D1A8AE37A36AE560C37448C9705A:0x403A40
      - Practical Malware Analysis Lab 01-04.exe_:0x4011FC
  features:
    - and:
      - match: host-interaction/file-system/write
      - match: host-interaction/process/create
